item.title: Need big help!
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

im starting a project with rich-scape v2 because it owns, but there is a few things thats bad about the server, special attacks being one, my dds special masses, and i dont like it, i am wondering if someone will help me, here is my dds special

public void DDSSpecial() {
    if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
        setAnimation(0x426);
        actionTimer = 4;
        SpecDamgNPC(playerMaxHit);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        resetAnimation();
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    } else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
        int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
        int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
        int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(playerMaxHit);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(0x426);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    }
}

thanks if you can help me.

Read full topic
